column1: A gloomy night just like any other, just my luck I get the call.
Now let's see what I'm looking at here...
Call it intuition, but if I click on these evidence markers I should learn a detail about the case.
Seems like there's a few other people here too, by clicking on them I should be able to see what they know.
I have a hunch all the information here is important, so I better get everything I can.
Certain things I notice I'll have to take a picture of. I can look at it again in my office later.
Once I'm sure I haven't missed a clue, I should take the cruiser back to the precinct by pressing M.
